post.author: K. Kwon
post.content:
We(ExtendMedia) have 2 open C# and 5 Java Positions.

http://www.extend.com

kwon96@gmail.com or fkwon@extend.com

TITLE: Java Developer
DEPARTMENT: Engineering Group
POSITION
This position is part of a team that is accountable to design, develop, optimize and
support software components that will enhance core functionality of ExtendMedia’s
software products under the supervision of the Server Team Manager.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Include but are not limited to:
• Design and development of software components based of requirements
• Design and development of application features based on technical design and
case tool documents.
• Transfer knowledge to other team members and QA
• Research and develop new technologies that are applicable to ExtendMedia’s
“OpenCASE” product
• Analyze/monitor/profile the application execution to improve performance and
memory utilization
• Technologies include Java, EJB 2.1, Struts, JSP, Oracle, SQL Server, Weblogic,
JBoss, Spring framework, Windows, Linux, C++ (nice to have), C# (nice to have)
KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS
Qualifications:
• 5 plus years of hands-on application development and trouble shooting
experience
• Demonstrated track record of being able to design and develop software for
scalability
• Effective English written and verbal communication skills and ability to work in a
team environment
• Self-motivated and positive attitude
Technical Requirements:
• 3-5 years hands on expertise with Java, EJB 2.1, CMP, Struts and JSP
• Experience with Eclipse, Subversion, Ant, Xdoclet, webservices and Windows
Media DRM is a definite asset

TITLE: C #  Developer
DEPARTMENT: Engineering Group
LOCATION: Toronto, Ontario
DESCRIPTION
This position is part of a team that is accountable to design, develop, optimize and support
software components that will enhance core functionality of OpenCASE client software under the
supervision of the Client Application Team Manager.
RESPONSIBILITIES
Include but are not limited to:
• Design and development of software components based of requirements
• Design and development of application features based on technical design and case tool
documents.
• Support for Application
• Design and develop stand-alone applications in .NET and C#
• Research and develop new technologies that are applicable to ExtendMedia’s
“OpenCASE” product
• Analyze/monitor/profile the application execution to improve performance and memory
utilization
• Development and maintenance of installer and updater components of client software
• Technologies include .NET framework, Spring.NET, J2EE (nice to have) and Linux (nice
to have)
KNOWLEDGE/EXPERIENCE/EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS
Qualifications:
• 5 plus years of hands-on application development and trouble shooting experience
• Demonstrated work experience of stand-alone application development
• Demonstrated track record of being able to design and develop software for scalability
• Effective English written and verbal communication skills and ability to work in a team
environment
• Ability to research/evaluate new technologies is a strong asset
• Self-motivated and positive attitude
Technical Requirements:
• 4+ years of programming experience in various environments using C# and .NET.
• 3-5 years hands on expertise with OO (UML), C#, XML
• Knowledge of Windows Media DRM, .NET Remoting, COM/ActiveX, and MFC is a
definite asset
post.title: 2 C# and 5 Java Positions
